item.title: [PI] Eleven 99 Stat Requirement? [PI]

item.description:
@Impious_Lols wrote:

I am making a quest, and I want to make it so when they click a certain object, they need eleven 99 stats.

In actionhandler under firstclickobject:

case 1111: if ***METHOD HERE**** { c.getPA().movePlayer(xxxx, yyyy, h); } else { c.sendMessage("You need eleven 99 stats to do this!"); }
